control.visible: [!String.IsEqual(Container(800).NumPages,1) + Skin.String(ExtendedInfo,1) + !String.IsEmpty(Window.Property(Biography))] | [!String.IsEqual(Container(150).NumPages,1) + Skin.String(ExtendedInfo,2)] | [!String.IsEqual(Container(250).NumPages,1) + Skin.String(ExtendedInfo,3)] | [!String.IsEqual(Container(550).NumPages,1) + Skin.String(ExtendedInfo,4)] | [!String.IsEqual(Container(650).NumPages,1) + Skin.String(ExtendedInfo,5)] | [!String.IsEqual(Container(450).NumPages,1) + Skin.String(ExtendedInfo,6)] | [!String.IsEqual(Container(750).NumPages,1) + Skin.String(ExtendedInfo,7)] | [!String.IsEqual(Container(350).NumPages,1) + Skin.String(ExtendedInfo,8)]
